overview: Rey is a 2017 comedy drama that follows the character Rey. He works in a small cubical surrounded by dirty windows and wilted plants. After the death of a work colleague he quits his job and is hit by a car, soon after his life takes a major turn driven by the events that cant be changed. He meets a girl and faces his fears all at the same time. But there is a fact about Rey that is still untold.
tagline: Sometimes life is one big risk
title: Rey
